text: South Garner High School is a school in Garner, North Carolina, in the Research Triangle area. It is a part of Wake County Public Schools. The mascot is the Titan and the school colors are platinum and purple. ==History== The building opened in 2016 for temporary use by Garner Magnet High School students while that school's campus was renovated. The building began operations as South Garner High in 2018."About Our School." South Garner High School. Retrieved on March 24, 2019. It initially opened to first and second- year students (freshmen and sophomores). The school building has three stories. The design is a larger version of the one used for Franklinton High School. ==References== ==External links== * South Garner High School Category:Public high schools in North Carolina Category:Schools in Wake County, North Carolina Category:2018 establishments in North Carolina Category:Educational institutions established in 2018
title: South Garner High School
